Text:
I would DL this book just for the picture to dream of (it's cold where i live).

anyway tx !

Hey Zappaz

Don't feel bad,it's cold where I live also,but summer is just two months away,you know what that means Time to chase tail, drink beer and surf

Nice book BBS. If you have more similar books then pls upload!!

Thank you!!!

I have already a same book of yours 'Mathematical Thinking, Quantitative Reasoning - R. Aufmann, et. al., (Houghton Mifflin, 2008) BBS' please skip it.

thanx again BBS

Its a pretty book. I like the coverage in the later chapters. The 'enhanced' seems to refer to material available on a 'webAssign' website. Its a goldmine but access codes needed i think. Welcome back ... not you bbs. ;)

Its a pretty picture certainly. What's not to like; although i'd prefer a hi-res version for a wallpaper.

OK, why don't i push a request. 'The complete works of Saki (H.H. Munro)'. Anything from 'Wordsworth classics' would be welcome (book flood).
